name: Very Bad Greeks
description:
Very Bad Greeks has you play as four Greek Gods, fallen into modern Greece, in a challenging mix of hack'n'slash and puzzle game.

Your goal: Claim back your place on Olympus!

Incarnez quatre dieux grecs projetés au milieu de la Grèce moderne, dans un jeu mixant beat them all et puzzle game.

Un seul objectif : Remonter sur l’Olympe !

Controls / Contrôles :

Warning: Before you start the game, unplug every controller, start the game, then plug them back once the menu is started.
